name: Apau Perape
description: The Apau Perape is a large fiend with a robust melee attack profile and a fanciful appearance that emphasizes its chaotic evil nature.
memorable: Its unique Diseased Ichor ability causes ongoing harm and danger to nearby creatures, even after initial combat.
goals: Typically aims to create chaos in battle and weaken enemies over time.
relations: May be associated with demons and other fiends, especially those it can summon.
environment: Typically found in dark and chaotic areas, possibly in demonic realms or corrupted lands.
strengths: High strength and dexterity scores enable it to excel in physical confrontations; advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage and unable to withstand poison despite immunity to poisoned conditions.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks with a Bite and two Claw attacks, delivering significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Diseased Ichor, which poisons nearby creatures and reduces their hit point maximum over time.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in darkness effectively.
skills: Excels in stealth, intimidation, and has moderate perception skills.
additional_information: Resistant to fire and lightning damage.
Can summon additional fiends to aid in combat.
Creates a zone of danger with its Fiery Roar ability, frightening enemies.
Immunity to the frightened and poisoned conditions.
Average intelligence but high physical capabilities.
